about.details:
Incorporated in 2007, Lorenzini Apparels Limited is engaged into the business of manufacturing, designing and marketing of readymade garments. Lorenzini Apparels offers diverse range of formal, semi-formal and casual wear for men and casual wear for women under the brand name 'Monteil & Munero', 'Monteil' and 'Calgari'.
Company has its own manufacturing setup at Delhi. The manufacturing process includes cutting, stitching, sewing, finishing, inspection and packing. Company also outsources some of the manufacturing.

Lorenzini Apparels sells its products through retail shops and online. Company sells its products through 18 exclusive stores/oulets located in Delhi, Haryana and Uttar Pradesh.

Lorenzini Apparels also have supply agreement with some of the e-commerce platform including Myntra, Limeroad, Flipkart, Jabong, Amazon, paytm etc. Company also have franchise model to sell products.

Company has 62 employees including 2 management personnel, 10 Skilled, 40 semi skilled and 12 unskilled employees.

faqs.question: What is the Lorenzini Apparels IPO?
faqs.answer:
Lorenzini Apparels IPO is a SME IPO of 4470000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.47 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹10 per share. The minimum order quantity is 10000.

The IPO opens on January 31, 2018, and closes on February 6, 2018.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Lorenzini Apparels IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Lorenzini Apparels IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Lorenzini Apparels IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Lorenzini Apparels IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Lorenzini Apparels IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Lorenzini Apparels IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Lorenzini Apparels IPO opens on January 31, 2018 and closes on February 6, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Lorenzini Apparels IPO?
faqs.answer: Lorenzini Apparels IPO lot size is 10000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,00,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Lorenzini Apparels IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Lorenzini Apparels IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Lorenzini Apparels IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Lorenzini Apparels IPO will be done on Friday, February 9, 2018, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, February 14, 2018. Check the Lorenzini Apparels IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Lorenzini Apparels IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Lorenzini Apparels IPO listing date is on Thursday, February 15, 2018.
